item.title: 股价下滑，Telus 暂停增加股息以削减债务
item.description: 泰勒斯公司（Telus Corp. ）表示，为应对投资者对其债务施加的压力，该公司将暂缓增加未来的股息。【原文：Telus Corp. said it’s putting future dividend increases on hold, responding to pressure from investors about its debt.】

item.title: 挪威迫在眉睫的电力缺口威胁对英出口
item.description: 挪威是欧洲最可靠的电力出口国之一，但在未来几年内将成为电力净购买国；这一转变可能会大幅削减流向英国和欧洲大陆的重要电力。【原文：Norway, one of Europe’s most reliable power exporters, is poised to become a net buyer in the coming years — a shift that may drastically cut vital flows to the UK and the continent.】

item.title: 科技股在 S&P 500 指数的最新反弹中被抛在后面
item.description: S&P 500 指数又回到了距离历史高点仅一步之遥的位置，而这一次引领反弹的并不是大型科技公司。【原文：The S&P 500 is back within spitting distance of an all-time high, and this time Big Tech isn’t leading the rebound.】

item.title: 巴西有望将更多甘蔗转用于生产乙醇 白糖上涨
item.description: 原糖期货在纽约连续第二天上涨，原因是市场猜测种植量最大的巴西糖厂可能会将更多甘蔗用于生产乙醇而不是甜味剂。【原文：Raw sugar futures rose for a second day in New York on speculation that mills in top grower Brazil may divert more cane to making ethanol rather than the sweetener.】

item.title: 格伦科尔承诺铜矿扩张，但削减 2026 年目标
item.description: Glencore Plc 计划到 2035 年将铜年产量提高到 160 万吨左右，以扭转金属产量下滑的局面，但该公司也被迫降低了明年的目标。【原文：Glencore Plc plans to boost annual copper production to about 1.6 million tons by 2035 as the miner seeks to reverse a slump in its output of the metal, but was also forced to lower its ambitions for next year.】

item.title: 白银价格为何比黄金价格上涨得更快
item.description: 由于美国特朗普政府的非正统经济政策让投资者和央行纷纷寻求避险资产，黄金在今年上演了戏剧性的反弹。但现在，白银正在成为焦点。【原文：Gold has staged a dramatic rally this year as the US Trump administration’s unorthodox economic policies sent investors and central banks reaching for safe-haven assets. Right now, however, it’s silver that’s stealing the spotlight.】

item.title: 诺贝尔奖得主警告中国在量子竞赛中落后 "纳秒级
item.description: 今年的诺贝尔物理学奖得主之一警告说，中国正在迅速缩小与美国在量子计算方面的差距。【原文：One of this year’s winners of the Nobel Prize in Physics warned that China is rapidly narrowing the gap with the US in quantum computing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行敦促意大利重新考虑黄金储备建议
item.description: 欧洲中央银行敦促意大利重新考虑宣布其黄金储备为本国人民财产的提议，批评人士认为此举可能为政府抛售黄金打开大门。【原文：Italy was urged by the European Central Bank to rethink a push to declare its gold reserves the property of its people, a move critics say could open the door to the government selling off bullion.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC 将于下周在印度首次公开募股 12 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度 ICICI 保诚资产管理公司可能最早于下周启动首次公开募股，筹资约 1,070 亿卢比（12 亿美元）。【原文：India’s ICICI Prudential Asset Management Co. is likely to launch its initial public offering as early as next week to raise around 107 billion rupees ($1.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description:

item.title: 波士顿写字楼不景气加剧，吴市长推动提高税收
item.description: 波士顿的商业建筑价值有望在 2026 财年再下降 6%，这加深了这座城市两年来的下滑趋势，而这座城市对房地产税收的依赖程度几乎超过了美国其他主要城市。【原文：Commercial building values in Boston are on track to fall another 6% in fiscal 2026, deepening a two-year slide in a city that leans more heavily on real estate taxes than almost any other major US municipality.】

item.title: 人工智能风险带来损失，Salesforce 的股价已处于历史低位
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 的股价从未如此便宜过，但投资者仍不买账，因为人们越来越担心人工智能会侵蚀该公司的增长前景。【原文：Salesforce Inc. shares have never been cheaper, but investors still aren’t buying amid rising fears about artificial intelligence eroding the company’s growth prospects.】

item.title: 加纳通胀再次放缓，引发再次降息的赌注

item.description: A legal challenge halting the UK’s efforts to consolidate all bond trading data looks set to be resolved, paving the way for the project to start next June.

item.title: Japan’s JFE Steel to Form $3.4 Billion Venture With JSW
item.description: Japan’s JFE Steel Corp. will invest 157.5 billion rupees ($1.7 billion) in an an equal joint venture with India’s JSW Steel, the Japanese company said in a statement.

item.title: Cosmo Shares Soar Most in 17 Years on Hair-Loss Treatment Data
item.description: Cosmo Pharmaceuticals NV shares soared the most in 17 years after the company said its experimental treatment for male hair loss showed breakthrough results in two late-stage studies.
